com.rift.coad.daemon.email
Interface EMailServerMBean

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface EMailServerMBean
extends java.rmi.Remote

The email server bean interface.

addDomain

void addDomain(java.lang.String domain)
               throws EmailException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
This method adds a domain to the email server, so that it knows it as local, but does not supply a default drop box for it. If no box is found for this domain the mail will be bounced.

Parameters:
domain - The domain to add.
Throws:
EmailException
java.rmi.RemoteException

               throws EmailException,

Parameters:
domain - The domain to add.
Throws:
EmailException
java.rmi.RemoteException

domain - The domain to remove.

removeDomainDropBox

void removeDomainDropBox(java.lang.String domain)
                         throws EmailException,
                                java.rmi.RemoteException
This method removes the default drop box from a domain. This will result in mail bouncing if it is not correctly addressed.

Parameters:
domain - The domain to remove the drop box from.
Throws:
EmailException
java.rmi.RemoteException

createMailBox

void createMailBox(java.lang.String domain,
                   java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   long quotaSize)
                   throws EmailException,
                          java.rmi.RemoteException
This method creates a new email box on a domain for the user. The user name for authentication purposes will be user@domain.

Parameters:
domain - The domain to create.
user - The username to create.
password - The password to assign to the user.
quotaSize - The size of the mail box.
Throws:
EmailException
java.rmi.RemoteException

Parameters:
